outputs.output_descr: Capacity of Judiciary, Human Rights Commission and Law enforcement institutions strengthened; Capacity of general population expanded to access justice; Capacity of national and local institutions including civil society organisations strengthened to respond to the needs of women and disadvantaged groups in society.

project_descr: Strengthening the Rule of Law and respect for human rights through access to justice for the poor and vulnerable groups
project_title: Improving access to justice & human right10
